EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for submitting your application to Step Forward
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Invitation to Assessment
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
Thank you for applying to Step Forward. We are pleased to tell you that you have been successful in your application and we would like to invite you to the first stage of our assessment event. We were very impressed with your application so congratulations on reaching this stage!
The assessment event is an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and find out if Step Forward is the right programme for you. The details of your assessment are as follows:
Date: Friday 17th July 2015
Stage One
Time: 09:00 - 12:00
Please arrive: 08.45
Lunch
Stage Two
Time: 13:00 - 17:00
Address: Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ
Please confirm your attendance here by Wednesday 15th July. If you do not confirm your attendance by the deadline we cannot guarantee that we can save you a space.
If you have any queries in the meantime please contact step.forward@the-challenge.org with ‘Step Forward Assessment’ in the subject title or call 0203 542 2400.
Well done once again for reaching this stage, we look forward to meeting you.
----------------------------------------------------
Important information about the assessment:
Stage 1: Friday 17th July, morning.
Teamwork activities Pathway activities.
Stage 2: Friday 17th July, afternoon.
Individual interviews
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
